title: [Large-Scale] Language Education Design Utilizing ICT-Based Asynchronous Remote Interaction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and fundamental digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Training for current practitioners aiming to improve language practical skills in a smartphone-centric, limited technological environment

learning_goals: Learners can perform effective communication in the target language during three or more role-play scenarios via VR simulations.
Learners improve language expressions by interacting with peer learners twice or more weekly on asynchronous discussion platforms.
Learners can self-diagnose and create correction plans for five or more pronunciation errors weekly using mobile-based voice feedback tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
